metadata.title: CVE-2024-35830 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:tc358743: register v4l2 async device only after successful setup Ensure thedevice has been setup correctly before registering the v4l2 async device,thus allowing userspace to access.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
